info.author: Buzz2d0
info.description:
# Boenkyo

> 一个“插件化的信息收集管理工具”

[![PyPI version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Boenkyo-0.0.3-green.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/Boenkyo/)
[![Python version](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3-orange.svg)]()

```
 _ 
|~) _  _  _ |    _ 
|_)(_)(/_| ||<\/(_)
              /
```

## Usage
```bash
$ boenkyo -h
usage: boenkyo [options]

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -v, --version         show program's version number and exit
  -l, --list            list all the plugins information and exit
  -p PLUGINS, --plugs PLUGINS
                        select plug-ins to run
  -t THREADS, --threads THREADS
                        Max number of concurrent network requests (default 8)

Log:
  Provide options to define log levels

  --loglevel {0,1,2,3,4,5}
                        set the log level: 0-5 (default 1)
  --verbose             set the log level: INFO
  -vv, --very_verbose   set the log level: DEBUG

Target:
  At least one of these options has to be provided to define the target(s)

  -u URL, --url URL     Target URL (e.g. "https://www.example.com")
  -f URL_FILE, --file URL_FILE
                        scan multiple targets given in a textual file

Request:
  Network request options

  --proxy PROXY         use a proxy to connect to the target URL
                        eg:http@127.0.0.1:8080
  --timeout TIMEOUT     seconds to wait before timeout connection (default 30)
  --retry RETRY         time out retrials times.
```

## Installation
`Boenkyo` is hosted on PYPI and can be installed as such:

```bash
$ pip3 install boenkyo
```

Alternatively, you can also get the latest source code from GitHub and install it manually:

```bash
$ git clone git@github.com:Rustybean/Boenkyo.git
$ cd Boenkyo
$ python setup.py install
```

### For update:
```bash
$ pip3 install boenkyo --upgrade
```

## License

MIT

## Thx
- https://github.com/w-digital-scanner/w13scan 代码框架、controller 等模仿自它
